concept.title: The C++ Caching API
concept.shortdesc: The native client C++ caching API allows C++ clients to manage data in a vFabric GemFire system. The online C++ API documentation (included in the docs/cppdocs directory of the GemFire native client product installation) provides extensive implementation details for the C++ structures and functions. Several example API programs are included in the SampleCodeDir/examples directory. See Running the Product Examples and QuickStart Guide

conbody.p: The native client C++ caching API allows C++ clients to manage data in a vFabric GemFire system. The online C++ API documentation (included in the docs/cppdocs directory of the GemFire native client product installation) provides extensive implementation details for the C++ structures and functions.
Several example API programs are included in the SampleCodeDir/examples directory. See XREF Running the Product Examples and QuickStart Guide
